bio: I am a senior software engineering expert with a strong foundation in various programming languages and web development frameworks. Over the past five years, I have specialized in using Laravel for backend development and Nuxt.js for frontend development. My expertise in Laravel has allowed me to build robust, scalable web applications, while my proficiency in Nuxt.js has enabled me to create highly performant, server-side rendered applications. Additionally, I have extensive experience in building admin panels using Laravel and Vue.js, creating intuitive and efficient interfaces for managing complex systems.

fieldActivity.title: Back-end developer
fieldActivity.explanation: Service implementation for different platforms (Android, iOS, Windows, web application)

fieldActivity.title: Front-end developer
fieldActivity.explanation: Using JavaScript framework to develop applications (ssr, spa)

fieldActivity.title: SEO specialist
fieldActivity.explanation: Activities to improve ranking and receive organic traffic in search engine results
